name: agapeconnectioncorporate
description: A simple website to act as a splash page for the Agape Connection company. It also describes the company's goals, mission, and vision.
author: Tom Brown <tombrown654321@protonmail.com>

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && yarn run dev" "cd client && yarn run start"
scripts.initial: yarn install && cd client && yarn install && cp .env_start .env && cd .. && cd server && yarn install && cp .env.production .env
scripts.pbc: git pull && yarn install && cd client && yarn install && yarn run build && cp .htaccess ./build
